short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mysterium VPN: Secure VPN for safer surfing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The largest selection of servers in just a few clicks with the Mysterium VPN Chrome extension!
With our Chrome extension, you can ensure safe and encrypted browsing whenever you want, wherever you may be.
What does the Mysterium VPN extension offer?
THE WIDEST LOCATION LIST
With over 135 locations available, you can access anything, anywhere, anytime.
FAST CONNECTION SPEEDS
Utilizing the Wireguard protocol, you can be sure to have the speediest connection, no matter which server you choose.
NO MORE RESTRICTED ACCESS
Access the content from your home country whenever you are abroad.
DECENTRALIZED FOR EXTRA SECURITY
Mysterium VPN is a decentralized VPN, and all connections are residential, adding a layer of security that centralized services can not provide.
NO-LOGS POLICY
Our VPN and the Chrome extension adhere to strict no-logs policies for your safety and privacy.
ONE ACCOUNT – MULTIPLE DEVICES
With a single Mysterium VPN subscription, you can browse safely on upwards to 6 devices.
ROBUST KILL-SWITCH
In case a VPN disconnection happens, you will remain safe with our kill-switch functionality, which turns off the internet in cases like these.
QUICK CONNECT
All it takes is installing the extension and getting a subscription – connect in just a few clicks.
ALWAYS-READY CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Our support team is here to help you if any issue happens.
Learn more about Mysterium VPN:
https://www.mysteriumvpn.com/
https://www.mysteriumvpn.com/privacy-policy-vpn
https://www.mysteriumvpn.com/terms-conditions-vpn
https://help.mysteriumvpn.com/en/
